name: ONLYOFFICE
description: This plugin allows users to edit office documents from Mattermost using ONLYOFFICE Docs.

settings_schema.header:
ONLYOFFICE Docs is an open-source office suite which comprises powerful collaborative editors for text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations highly compatible with OOXML formats. 
 
 
 Please note! ONLYOFFICE script code will be downloaded and executed from the server at the given address.
settings_schema.footer:
**ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud**
Easily launch the editors in the cloud without downloading and installation
 
[**Get now**](https://www.onlyoffice.com/docs-registration.aspx?referer=mattermost)

settings.help_text: This field specifies the address of the server with ONLYOFFICE Docs installed. Please change the '<documentserver>' for the server address in the above line.
